This was when I was loading the fitted model and extracted the probabilities.

```{r}
data<-read.delim("~/STA4006W 2025/Latex and Research/file69cc44ee5d77.datP")
z_mat <- data[, 1:200]
posterior_probs <- colMeans(z_mat) 
responder_class <- posterior_probs > 0.95 #use 95% since thats what we use for hypothesis testing
true_class <- posterior_probs > 0.5  

# classification table
(classification_table <- table(responder_class, true_class))
ps_mat <- data[, 201:400] #probabilities for stimulated
pu_mat <- data[, 401:600] #probailities for unstimulated.
```
